title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 108 - Public Access To Authority Records
content:

State Regulations
§ 108.1 - Records available for inspection and copying; fees
§ 108.2 - Rights of party denied copying; access to records
§ 108.3 - Repealed
§ 108.4 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 108

Statutory authority: Public Authorities Law, §§ 354[5], 387, art. 2, title 9; Public Officers Law, §§87, 89

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
